# Interface: IViewDescriptor\<T, U\>

Definition of a view.

| Name |
| :------ |
| `T` |
| `U` |

## Properties

### entity

• **entity**: [`IEntityDescriptor`](IEntityDescriptor.md)\<`T`\>

The entity this view is associated with.
